tool:
Filters out positions with multiple hits or no hits
## The command is a Cheetah template which allows some Python based syntax. ## Lines starting hash hash are comments. Galaxy will turn newlines into spaces ## ! We only have a simple single command here.
2_sort.py -s ${snp_table} -o output_file.txt -t total.txt; cut -f1 output_file.txt > header.txt | cut -f2- output_file.txt > seq.txt; cat seq.txt | sed 's/[[:blank:]]//g' >seq2.txt; paste header.txt seq2.txt >tab.txt; echo DONE!
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
Removes multiallelic positions within the same genome and positions with no hit.
